channel.title: admin on Jinliang Liu
channel.description: Recent content in admin on Jinliang Liu

item.description: I’m a physical oceanographer with an interest in understanding oceanic physical and biogeochemical processes. During my PhD, I have been focused on oceanic surface boudanry layer (OSBL) turbulence and its roles in marine particle dynamics. I’m currently a graduate research assistant working with Prof. Jun-Hong Liang in the Deparment of Oceanography & Coastal Sciences at Louisia State University. a wide variatey of numerical models, including LES, MITgcm, FVCOM, Nelson Bighetti is a professor of artificial intelligence at the Stanford AI Lab.
